Answers: Tickets are available only through the ticket page of this website.

Questions: What if I lose my ticket?
Answers: If you have los your tickert, you can view and download your tickets directly from your account. Simply log and download.

Questions: Can I get a refund for my ticket?
Answers: Unfortunately, we are not able to refund tickets that can no longer be used. You are however allowed to sell or gift your tickets to friends.

Questions: Can I bring my own food and drink?
Answers: Yes, you can but please refrain from bringing any glass and keep the site clean. We have asked all our food providers to make their meals affordable (as well as good quality).

Questions: When does the festival site open and close?
Answers: Gates open on 25th July at 12 noon. The site will open at 9am and close again at 9pm. The festival closes completely at 2pm on 8th August.

Questions: Is the mobile coverage on the site?
Answers: Yes, but it can be patchy and depends on your network provider. If you think you will need mobile internet coverage itâ€™s best to check with your provider first.

Unfortunately, we can't provide you with lockers. Never leave your things unsupervised.

Questions: What if I lose an item at the site?
Answers: If you have lost an item, please contact our Lost and Found services directly on info +45 00 00 00 00.
